Class BoardGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • BoardGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class BoardGUI
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The board gui that contains the sudoku It contains all 81 cells and buttons from 1-9 to be used as input for the cells Buttons to prevent users from entering invalid inputs
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • createSquares

        public javax.swing.JPanel createSquares()
        Creates all 81 cells. Uses a 2dim array to store all cells We have two 2dim arrays. One to display the numbers and one to store the sudoku.
